title: Could it be possible to make laser blasters like in Star Wars? - Quora

response.answer_text: We don’t currently have the technology to make Star Wars like blasters. The reason why the Star Wars franchise blasters are so much more effective is because they can fire much longer their our current projectile weapons before they have to be replenished with gas charges. Plus they are very deadly especially to unarmored foes from point blank range to quite a ways off. Blaster/Legends

Well, blasters aren’t actually a laser. laser technology is used in their design, but they’re actually a high energy particle beam. Basically, a blaster passes a laser through a dense packet of tibanna gas. Tibanna gas is kind of weird, it acts as a multiplier for any energy that’s passed through it. The beam fired by the blaster is actually a bolt of condensed, highly energised gas mixed with a laser to make the aforementioned particle beam.
